meanings.definition: Of or relating to an axon.
meanings.sent1: The axonic nerve fibers transmit signals in the body.
meanings.sent2: The axonic neuron carries messages between the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent3: The axonic axon threw a party for all the other neurons.
meanings.sent4: His axonic speed in relaying information was like a lightning bolt.
meanings.sent5: The axonic connection was as vital as a bridge between two lands.

meanings.sent1: The axonic cell extends its axon to communicate with other cells.
meanings.sent2: An axonic neuron is essential for transmitting electrical impulses.
meanings.sent3: The axonic axon proudly displayed its length compared to others.
meanings.sent4: Her axonic ability to send signals was like a skilled messenger.
meanings.sent5: The axonic structure resembled a long, slender bridge connecting regions.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the presence of axons.
meanings.sent1: The axonic network in the brain allows for rapid communication.
meanings.sent2: An axonic system ensures efficient transmission of information.
meanings.sent3: The axonic axon community organized a relay race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The axonic organization of the team resembled a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The axonic landscape was like a bustling highway of information flow.
